title: Insane battery drain on google pixel 3
content:
My google pixel 3 is brand new (3.5 months) and was working perfectly until this morning. After I left home for work on 100% it drained to 0% within 3 hours of limited use. At the current rate it is draining 1% battery every 2 minutes of not touching the phone at all. The phone is extremely hot and overheats within seconds of use. It only seems to charge when I turn off the phone, otherwise the battery continues to drain while charging the phone.

The circled blue parts are the crazy battery drain within a few hours. It doesn't seem like the apps are using up much of the battery. One day ago my battery life was extremely good and completely normal, please help!
I have tried restarting my phone in safe mode, checking the app updates but nothing seems to work.

Thank you!
